website_summaries.verdict: A step up from smaller racing drones, this mid-range unit boasts longer range and battery life.
pros: Lightning quick and agile with a range of more than a mile
Excellent battery life at more than 20 minutes
Included camera’s video image is clear and steady
Return home function is reliable, even with a poor connection
cons: Somewhat complex to set up for first flight
Using a smartphone to control the drone isn’t recommended due to poor connection

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this drones because you can do tricks with it
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be sorry!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Beebop drone. Takes Professsional looking videos! The camera in this drone is very good!
customer_reviews.author: Lance Gimbal

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Range is exaggerated, I have lost signal consistently at 600 feet, but it returns like designed, just make sure there isn't anything between the return site and the drone. Camera us great, better quality than I expected. Difficulties connecting phone to drone, takes about 3 times to finally connect, I wish it was easier. Flies great, great drone for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Reed Scow

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase !
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves drones. This is by far the best one we’ve gotten her. It costs more but MUCH better quality so worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product found to be of very good quality and to my satisfaction
customer_reviews.author: Senor

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Had some problems in the beginning, operator error. Figured it out, now I'm as happy as can be since I waited for whole month to get all pieces together and be able to fly. My third drone in a month. Happy with this choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: quick ship, new in package. Can't wait to fly it
customer_reviews.author: D. Poll

customer_reviews.title: reliable, robust and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Extremely user friendly and the learning curve is really sharp. great video and photo clarity. drones are very robust and can within reason take a fall. customer service is excellent and there for you, not a number but a human. 100% recommend this product please note the video is only 480 due to upload requirements, HD versions can be seen at Vimeo.com/20eight2
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great small drone for what I want - to document ...
customer_reviews.text: Great small drone for what I want - to document my outdoor activities - fishing, birdhunting, camping, and new locations. Operates from phone and use the Follow-Me function mostly as I am often alone when doing the things I love.
customer_reviews.author: TN Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Buying something else.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it in Sept 2016, flew it a couple of times then put it away till spring. Charged it up, and it no longer works, at all! I don't know if it is the charger, the battery or the drone itself. It flew well those couple times, but for the price, shouldn't be disposable!
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchase for a Christmas gift. Waiting for nicer weather here in NE to take it out.
customer_reviews.author: tony sanzo

customer_reviews.title: I loved it it really does require making sure you watch ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved it it really does require making sure you watch to tutorials on YouTube before you pilot if you're a beginner. After that it's a blast
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: The best fligbt experience. So much fun to use. Good job to Parrot!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Vincent Casino

customer_reviews.title: Less than OK
customer_reviews.text: Very mediocre product. Bought this and the DJI phantom 3 standard at the same time. This costs $40 more than the DJI and is far less quality. Camera is ok. I lost reception using my iPad at about 40 every time. You can buy the remot controller for the bebop which may help but by the time you purchase the controller and the drone it's closing in on 1000 and you may as well out the money toward a phantom
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Turner

customer_reviews.title: Image quality is HORRIBLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Flies great but the picture quality is HORRIBLE! I would not recommend this as a serious piece of equipment for taking pictures or movies because the image quality is so bad. But, as a toy, this is fun to fly and will record what you are doing for fun. More for children then for professionals.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Have to wait till Xmass.
customer_reviews.text: It is a Christmas present so I don't have it now. Based on my two Bebop's I expect enjoy the Bebop 2 a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Pospeschil

customer_reviews.title: #fail
customer_reviews.text: Took it out of the box, lost wifi signal at 200', the automatic return home function returned it into the trees. Product was destroyed. We don't live near anything that would interfere with the wifi signal. Waiting on a lengthy case study from the manufacturer which will likely result in nothing. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Sarris

customer_reviews.title: bad customer support
customer_reviews.text: Dangerous drone, literally falls out of sky, bad customer support. very poor tech support. It can be modified with better antennas and boosting the sky ctrl 2 . to get you 2 miles out with good fpv, for another 600.00 bucks. Better off with a mavic pro. I mean much better off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It has been a fantastic drone, beautiful videos and ZERO problems
customer_reviews.text: I flew my 100th flight with my bebop 2 fpv today! It has been a fantastic drone, beautiful videos and ZERO problems! All the negative reports I see leave me scratching my head? User error? Stupidity? Or both? If this one ever dies I'll get another one in a heartbeat! Parrot has been easy to contact and very nice and helpful when ever i have had questions.
customer_reviews.author: mike cuthbertson

customer_reviews.title: Nice drone. ask about fly aways
customer_reviews.text: Nice drone but mine went crazy and flew away a year ago never seen it again.
customer_reviews.author: Papasmurf

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Just received product missing parts and Drone is filthy dirty. Sending it right back the way it came and totally just wrecked my first and last mail order disaster. Junk!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick wojcik

customer_reviews.title: Okay Drone
customer_reviews.text: This drone was very good for a starter flier. The quality of the video is not at the same level as some that are around the same price range. It is good to learn how to maneuver around. It is also very fast and love the follow me feature but it sometimes slows down and loses you as well as since it does not have sensors to not crash it is best to use this in an open field.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmine Kenney

customer_reviews.title: Parrot makes junk and doesn't stand behind it
customer_reviews.text: Bought the drone and flew it several times and then it crashed for no reason. Parrot says user error based on an app that had a bug and because there was an update available it was not covered under their non-existent warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: WARNING READ BEFORE YOU BUY !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you don't buy the bundle they will rip your eyes out!!! Controller is $350 extra! Good luck getting a matching color to. FPV glasses junk cant adjust lenses. If the drone looses contact if just flies away. buy buy $549 or more. Remember all the accessories are junk if you do have the drone. New bebop 2 drone $$$$$$ They are only interested in selling a product and the customer service is terrible!!! Save yourself the headaches stay away. Don't disappoint your kids! They have done A LOT of false advertising....I've been with Amazon for ten years and this is my only review I have written! Respectfully US Veteran
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: Well fly away trust me
customer_reviews.text: I had two just fly away no return and I had a battery stabilizer with check all 3 cells while charging
customer_reviews.author: greg sunday

customer_reviews.title: Fun but apps for it charge you
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fly and lots of control options only problem is all apps available for it once you to pay them to use the features that this drone should do for the money I already paid
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We thought this an excellent gift for my responsible son
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this drone. At this moment we are at a 1... Lets see, the drone has not flown over 98ft and cannot fly over tall trees. My son loves all things rote. Especially those that fly. We thought this an excellent gift for my responsible son. He was flying the Bebop 2 within 200 yds of takeoff when to camera blacked out. He immediately hit "return to home." The drone has not returned and is nowhere to be found. We have scoured the return path and surrounding area. Nothing. Just great. $400 bucks gone. This could have happened to me... So doesnt matter age in this account.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DRONE AMAZING FOOTAGE FISHEYE IS LOVE FISHEYE IS LIFE ...
customer_reviews.text: GREAT DRONE AMAZING FOOTAGE FISHEYE IS LOVE FISHEYE IS LIFE I HAVE THIS DRONE PHANTOM FOURS ARE HORRIBLE PARROT BEBOPS ARE LIGHT WITH AMAZING FOOTAGE
customer_reviews.author: Simone Politidis

product_meta.title: Parrot Bebop 2 Drone- White
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteMeet Bebop 2, a second-generation Parrot Quadcopter Drone. First in its weight class to surpass 20 minutes of autonomous flight time, this sleek and durable drone doesn’t just travel far, it travels well. The 3-axis digital stabilization offers pilots a fixed angle of the view, regardless of altitude or turbulence. The 14mpx, 1080p camera captures the moment via live streaming video or recorded clips. Take in the horizon with a stunning 186° field of view and keep track of your location with the new, powerful rear flash LED. Fly for up to 25 minutes at speeds of up to 38 mph
feature_bullets: Enhanced 14 megapixel fish-eye lens offers 1080p video recording and stunning image capture
25 minutes of flight time thanks to a powerful 2700 mAh battery
Equipped with powerful motors for flight in greater altitudes
Powerful rear flash LED for better visibility—even in the dark
Requires registration with FAA. Visit their website for more info on how to register.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars273 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
